biotools.summary: HSEpred is a web server to predict the HSE(Half-Sphere Exposure) measures and infer residue contact numbers using the predicted HSE values, based on a well-prepared non-homologous protein structure dataset.

bioschemas.name: HSEpred
bioschemas.summary: HSEpred is a web server to predict the HSE(Half-Sphere Exposure) measures and infer residue contact numbers using the predicted HSE values, based on a well-prepared non-homologous protein structure dataset.
